title: Save a whopping $500 and get the 16-inch MacBook Pro for under $2,000 right now
content:
Macworld

The MacBook Pro is back to its best price of $1999 at Amazon, a $500 discount. This all-time-low deal is a stunning price for one of the best laptops you can get right now, especially one we gave a 4.5-star rating and our Editors’ Choice award.

We reviewed the 14-inch version of the MacBook Pro with the M3 Pro chip and found it was downright fantastic, offering a balanced set of processor, memory, and SSD at a great price. “The MacBook Pro M3 Pro proves to be a good work tool for everyday tasks. It’s noticeably faster than the MacBook Pro M3–the extra money you must pay to upgrade from the M3 to the M3 Pro is well-spent money,” our review notes.

The model that’s on sale right now comes with a supercharged M3 Pro chip and 18GB of RAM and is built to handle any task, breezing through multitasking and even intense projects like editing 4K video. The 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display is absolutely gorgeous, displaying great colors in any light. The screen has up to 1000 nits of brightness, so you can even use this one when working outdoors.

The impressive battery life of up to 22 hours. Basically, you can work all day without worrying about your charger if you forget it at home. You can join in on video calls with ease, knowing the 1080p camera will focus on you at all times. The laptop also features a three-mic array and a six-speaker sound system.

Whether you’re going back to school or need a powerful new laptop for work, don’t miss this incredible deal to get the MacBook Pro for $1,999, especially since such steep discounts don’t come up every day.
